front.title: The Incident Object Description Exchange Format v2

abstract.t: The Incident Object Description Exchange Format (IODEF) defines a data representation for security incident reports and indicators commonly exchanged by operational security teams for mitigation and watch and warning. This document describes an updated information model for the IODEF and provides an associated data model specified with XML Schema. This new information and data model obsoletes Request for Comment (RFC) 5070 and 6685.
